comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be the boxer from Chicago: www.boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=30118&cat=boxer Could be the same as memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/r?ammem/cdn:@field(NUMBER+@b... and memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/r?ammem/cdn:@field(NUMBER+@b... from the Chicago Daily News.

comment.author: 81651224@N00
comment._content: Manager is probably Harry Gilmore Jr., son of Prof. Harry Gilmore (q.v.) Gilmore Jr. also managed Packy McFarland, another Chicago fighter photographed by Bain. Note that there is a (backwards) inscription at the right: S.S. 3-24-13. So it was either shot, developed, printed, or (what?) on that date, depending on who or what S.S. was.
